Class InverseBoolConverter

Converter that inverts boolean values. Useful for scenarios like binding the IsEnabled property of controls to a "busy" flag, where the control should be disabled when the busy flag is true.

Convert(object, Type, object, CultureInfo)

Converts a boolean value to its inverse.

Declaration
public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)
Parameters
Type Name Description
object value

The value to convert, expected to be a boolean.
Type targetType

The type to which the value is being converted (ignored).
object parameter

Additional parameter (ignored).
CultureInfo culture

The culture to use for conversion (ignored).
Returns
Type Description
object

If the value is a boolean, returns its logical inverse; otherwise, returns the original value.
